THIS IS A FAKE. The reason it looks like homebrew is the card see\'s no header on the file? The file is a 128mb of 0x00000000. Whoever said it was working is lying or has a different torrent.

This is NOT a fake. It\'s a clean dump of the ROM. Thus, there\'s anti-piracy included in the dump. You either need to wait for your flash cart to come out with a fix or just google the words, Dragon Quest IX Xenom.
